name: elrint2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cint(c2))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cv(s0)))))

stmt.origin: baib(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cin(c1, cint(c2))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cv(s0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cint(c2))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cv(s0)))))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cint(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cv(s0)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cint(c2))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cv(s0)))))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cint(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cv(s0)))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cint(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cv(s0)))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cint(c2))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c0, cv(s0)))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: Membership in a restricted intersection. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Apr-2015.)
